img_summary: The image depicts a small stone bowl containing reddish-brown seeds, likely representing a type of medicinal or collectible seed in the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the preceding and following text, this image is part of a series showcasing various seeds that can be randomly obtained from collecting specific plants in the game. These seeds, such as Gentian Seeds, Jade Lotus Seeds, Fragrant Jade Flower Seeds, and Fire Bellflower Seeds, are categorized as "Uncommon" items and may play a role in crafting or gameplay progression.
